title: Creamier Typeface
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414223935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_6024_5937.JPG)

I am looking to find out what the sans-serif typeface is....the larger type
author: amg703

comments.content: It looks like **[Neuzeit S Book Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414223935/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Neuzeit%20S%20LT%20BookHeavy%20-%20Regular&fid=5eace809f31c88ceb8d8b6e75f577dd0&fsize=60&text=New%20York%20Basel%20Hiroshima%20London%20Buenos%20Aires&wrap=2)** by Wilhelm Pischner [1959]
